ca.uqac.dim.mapreduce.OutCollector Interface Reference

Data source used as the output of the map and reduce phases. More...

Public Member Functions

void collect (Tuple t)
 Add a new tuple to the Collector.

Detailed Description

Data source used as the output of the map and reduce phases.

An OutCollector can be used to store data tuples using the collect method.
